titleInfo.title: Full Gospel Tabernacle in Jesus' Name service, 1997 August 3

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service opened by pastor Jamie Coots. After he welcomes members to the service, music begins and members clap along to the rhythm. A young woman takes up the microphone and sings. After her song, the tempo picks up and members dance and handle serpents. Many members handle, including John Brown, John Wayne "Punkin" Brown Jr., Dewey Chafin, Charles Church, Jamie Coots, Glenn Dukes, Melissa Evans, Spencer Evans, Steve Frazier, Bruce Helton, Lydia Hollins, David Kimbrough, Bobbie Sue Lynn, Larry Muncie, Daryl Philips, Carl Porter, Paul Roberts, Nola Faye Roberts, Verlin Short, Billy and Joyce Summerford, Billy Taylor, Diane Tucker, Carl Turner, and Alan Williams. After the music comes to an end, Billy Taylor and Bruce Helton testify and preach. Others testify before the music begins again and members take to the floor and dance. A lull in the music provides Billy Taylor an opportunity to prepare to handle fire. More testimony ends the recording.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
